text: Pocky is a Japanese snack food. They are chocolate-coated biscuit sticks. They are made by Ezaki Glico and were first sold in 1966. They can be found in flavors such as chocolate, strawberry, almond and others. They are sold in Europe under the name Mikado. ==References== == Other websites == * Official website Category:Snack foods Category:Japanese food
title: Pocky
